overviewTranslations.overview: Ο Τζίμι Μαγκίλ επιστρέφει με νέα στάση απέναντι στη ζωή και ολοένα περισσότερες ορέξεις που θα σπρώξουν την καριέρα –και τις σχέσεις του– σε αχαρτογράφητα νερά.

Season one left Jimmy at the center of a large class-action lawsuit that led to a promising job opportunity at a prestigious firm in Santa Fe. Having arrived at a fork in the road, will Jimmy take the straight and narrow path with a safe corporate job or will he fall back into his “Slippin’ Jimmy” con artist ways?
Jimmy McGill új életszemlélettel tér vissza, és egyre növekvő becsvágya ismeretlen utakra tereli karrierjét és kapcsolatait.
Jimmy McGill powraca w kolejnej odsłonie z jeszcze większymi aspiracjami, które popchną go na nieznane tory życia prywatnego i zawodowego.
Jimmy McGill regressa com uma nova filosofia de vida e ambições que vão levar a sua carreira - e as suas relações pessoais - para um território desconhecido.
Jimmy McGill volta mais mais ambicioso e disposto a muito mais para levar a vida, carreira e relacionamentos a novas alturas.
